items.name: init(mChannelLabel: AudioChannelLabel, mChannelFlags: AudioChannelFlags, mCoordinates: (Float32, Float32, Float32))
var mChannelFlags: AudioChannelFlags
items.desc: Flags that control the interpretation of mCoordinates. See Channel Coordinate Flags for possible values.

items.name: var mChannelLabel: AudioChannelLabel
items.desc: The AudioChannelLabel structure that describes the channel.

items.name: var mCoordinates: (Float32, Float32, Float32)
items.desc: An ordered triple that specifies a precise speaker location. See AudioChannelCoordinateIndex for the interpretation of the items in the array.
